content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!-- edited with XMLSpy v2014 sp1 (x64) (http://www.altova.com) by XMLSpy 2013 Professional Ed. Release 2, Installed for 6 users (with SMP from 2013-10-18 to 2014-10-19) (NOAA) --> <!--  Questions about this schema can be directed to XML.DR@noaa.gov --> <xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified">  <xs:include schemaLocation="BasicTypes.xsd"/>  <xs:include schemaLocation="Decisions.xsd"/>  <xs:include schemaLocation="HorizontalControl.xsd"/>  <xs:include schemaLocation="VerticalControl.xsd"/>  <xs:complexType name="H-VMethodsType">   <xs:sequence>    <xs:element name="USCGBeacon" type="USCGBeaconType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>    <xs:element name="sitesUsed" type="SitesUsedType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>    <xs:element name="vDatummodel" type="Vdatum-ModelType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">     <xs:annotation>      <xs:documentation>auto-populated from data in the PIs</xs:documentation>     </xs:annotation>    </xs:element>    <xs:element name="ERZTModel" type="ERZT-ModelType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>    <xs:element name="constantSeparationModel" type="ConstantSeparationModelType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">     <xs:annotation>      <xs:documentation>auto-populated from data in the PIs</xs:documentation>     </xs:annotation>    </xs:element>    <xs:element name="discussion" type="DiscussionType"/>   </xs:sequence>   <xs:attribute name="methodUsed" type="MethodUsedType" use="required"/>  </xs:complexType>  <xs:complexType name="HVMethod-BasicType">   <xs:complexContent>    <xs:restriction base="H-VMethodsType">     <xs:sequence>      <xs:element name="discussion" type="DiscussionType"/>     </xs:sequence>    </xs:restriction>   </xs:complexContent>  </xs:complexType>  <xs:complexType name="HVMethod-SitesType">   <xs:complexContent>    <xs:restriction base="H-VMethodsType">     <xs:sequence>      <xs:element name="sitesUsed" type="SitesUsedType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>      <xs:element name="discussion" type="DiscussionType"/>     </xs:sequence>    </xs:restriction>   </xs:complexContent>  </xs:complexType>  <xs:complexType name="HVMethod-DGPSType">   <xs:complexContent>    <xs:restriction base="H-VMethodsType">     <xs:sequence>      <xs:element name="USCGBeacon" type="USCGBeaconType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>      <xs:element name="sitesUsed" type="SitesUsedType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>      <xs:element name="discussion" type="DiscussionType"/>     </xs:sequence>    </xs:restriction>   </xs:complexContent>  </xs:complexType>  <xs:complexType name="HVMethod-ConstantSepType">   <xs:complexContent>    <xs:restriction base="H-VMethodsType">     <xs:sequence>      <xs:element name="constantSeparationModel" type="ConstantSeparationModelType" maxOccurs="unbounded">       <xs:annotation>        <xs:documentation>auto-populated from data in the PIs</xs:documentation>       </xs:annotation>      </xs:element>      <xs:element name="discussion" type="DiscussionType"/>     </xs:sequence>    </xs:restriction>   </xs:complexContent>  </xs:complexType>  <xs:complexType name="HVMethod-VDatumType">   <xs:complexContent>    <xs:restriction base="H-VMethodsType">     <xs:sequence>      <xs:element name="vDatummodel" type="Vdatum-ModelType" maxOccurs="unbounded">       <xs:annotation>        <xs:documentation>auto-populated from data in the PIs</xs:documentation>       </xs:annotation>      </xs:element>      <xs:element name="discussion" type="DiscussionType"/>     </xs:sequence>    </xs:restriction>   </xs:complexContent>  </xs:complexType>  <xs:complexType name="HVMethod-ERZTType">   <xs:complexContent>    <xs:restriction base="H-VMethodsType">     <xs:sequence>      <xs:element name="ERZTModel" type="ERZT-ModelType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>      <xs:element name="discussion" type="DiscussionType"/>     </xs:sequence>    </xs:restriction>   </xs:complexContent>  </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>
